message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit you. Considering its value and the benefits it provides, I am extending an initial offer of $15,000 for the product. This price includes not only the cost of the product but also some exclusive services and support that will ensure its optimal use in your endeavors.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on your product and the services you're including. However, my budget for this purchase is $12,000. I'm willing to buy the product from you at that price. Let me know what you think.
